SYSTEM: Vadim.pdf: Página 8
November 12, 2015
8
Gravitation and Fitness in Ontology Dynamics
Open Issues? 
•
 
Ontology Change –
 
studies the ways
 
to change 
an ontology in response to a need
–
 
C.F.: Kinematics –
 
studies the motion of objects without a reference 
to its causes
•
 
Ontology Change:
–
 
In fact does Kinematics but misses the study of the causes that trigger 
the need
–
 
C.F.: Dynamics -
 
is concerned with the study of forces and torques 
and their effect on motion
•
 
Ontology Change misses Ontology Dynamics
–
 
What would be the force causing this going 
faster then 100 mph?
speaker: SYSTEM
